title: NBA 2K20 – v1.02 + Roster Update Sep 6, 2019
body:
NBA 2K20 – v1.02 + Roster Update Sep 6, 2019


Genres/Tags: Sports, Basketball, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Visual Concepts, 2K Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 76 GB
Repack Size: from 43.6 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on NBA.2K20-CODEX ISO release: codex-nba.2k20.iso (81,287,446,528 bytes)
  • NBA.2K20.Update.v1.02-CODEX (165 MB) applied over
  • Optional NBA 2K20 Official Roster Update [Day 1, Sep 6 2019] added, thanks to molivos!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Spanish and Chinese commentaries
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 76 to 43.6~48.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~1 hour on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 87 GB (90 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

NBA 2K has evolved into much more than a basketball simulation. 2K continues to redefine what’s possible in sports gaming with NBA 2K20, featuring best in class graphics & gameplay, ground breaking game modes, and unparalleled player control and customization. Plus, with its immersive open-world Neighborhood, NBA 2K20 is a platform for gamers and ballers to come together and create what’s next in basketball culture.
